SEARCH
Package com.tms.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.tms.controller.ClientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/client") public class ClientController extends Object
ClientController is a class controller that responds to incoming requests from the path("/client")

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Client>> getAll()
      getAll is a GET method that shows all clients from db
      Returns:
      200 ok

    • getClientById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Client> getClientById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      getClientById is a GET method that shows the client by requested id in url path
      Returns:
      200 ok if client was found and 409 conflict otherwise

    • createClient

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> createClient(@RequestBody Client client)
      createClient is a POST method that creates the client by given json data
      Returns:
      201 created if client was created and 409 conflict otherwise

    • updateClient

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> updateClient(@RequestBody Client client)
      updateClient is a PUT method that updates the client by given json data
      Returns:
      204 no content if client was updated and 409 conflict otherwise

    • updateClientFirstName

      @PutMapping("/{id}/{first-name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> updateClientFirstName(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("first-name") String name)
      updateClientFirstName is a PUT method that updates client's first name by url path
      Returns:
      204 no content if client's first name was updated and 409 conflict otherwise

    • updateClientLastName

      @PutMapping("/{id}/{last-name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> updateClientLastName(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("last-name") String name)
      updateClientLastName is a PUT method that updates client's last name by url path
      Returns:
      204 no content if client's last name was updated and 409 conflict otherwise

    • updateClientPhoneNumber

      @PutMapping("/{id}/{phone-number}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> updateClientPhoneNumber(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("phone-number") String phoneNumber)
      updateClientPhoneNumber is a PUT method that updates client's phone number by url path
      Returns:
      204 no content if client's phone number was updated and 409 conflict otherwise

    • deleteClient

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> deleteClient(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      deleteClient is a DELETE method that deletes the client by requested id in url path
      Returns:
      204 no content if client was deleted and 409 conflict otherwise
